title: Hard Rock hotel construction collapses in New Orleans; watch the harrowing video
text:
CLOSE

The construction of a Hard Rock hotel on Canal Street in New Orleans collapsed Saturday morning.

Video provided to local CBS-affiliated television station WWL-TV shows the harrowing moments when the building's frame fell several stories in the air to the street.

It is unknown at this point what caused the collapse or what injuries may have occurred.

The video shows several people running from the collapse.

The New Orleans Fire Department and emergency medical services and the police have responded to the scene at Canal and North Rampart streets.

The hotel was expected to open in the spring, according to The Associated Press.

INCREDIBLE VIDEO: Viewer video from Michael Dalle captures the moment the construction site for the Hard Rock Hotel collapsed on Canal Street Saturday morning. No injuries reported. Stay with WWL-TV for more. pic.twitter.com/AxkbniBrZI — WWL-TV (@WWLTV) October 12, 2019

Story developing.

Goodnight, Hard Rock: Las Vegas hotel and casino will close 8 months for renovation

More: Hard Rock Hotel in Dominican Republic to remove liquor dispensers after tourist deaths
